Message.Msg: It is as though Dell and Ichan are in a stareing contest to see who blinks first.. No, Ichan has not made a formal bid but has put out two proposals in an effort to force M Dell's hand.As a result this chess game may not br finally resolvef until Sept.-Oct.

Message.Msg: Dude, wake up, Dell is a broken model. Look at the fundamentals before you invest. I am sure very many employees are in the same boat as you are at Dell.
Dude, wake up, Dell is a broken model. Look at the fundamentals before you invest. I am sure very many employees are in the same boat as you are at Dell.
Why would M Dell , who knows Dell much better than you, want to buy into a broken model.By the way I am a retired portfolio manager not an employee
